mapper.select: SELECT yg.goods_id,yg.store_id,yg.goods_name,yg.goods_num,yg.goods_serialnumber,yg.goods_price,yg.goods_summary,yg.goods_total_sell,yg.goods_total_fav,yg.goods_total_comment, yg.goods_total_see, yg.goods_content,yg.goods_content_pics,yg.goods_attr_select,yg.goods_attrs,yg.goods_pics,yg.goods_cover,yg.goods_province_id,yg.goods_city_id,yg.goods_freight, yg.brand_id,yg.brand_name,yg.goods_afterservice,yg.goods_avg_score,yg.goods_created_time, yd.depot_id,yd.depot_price FROM yd_goods yg LEFT JOIN yd_depot yd ON yg.goods_id = yd.goods_id WHERE yd.depot_type = 2 order by yg.goods_created_time limit #{to},40
select count(1) from yd_goods yg LEFT JOIN yd_depot yd ON yg.goods_id = yd.goods_id WHERE yd.depot_type = 2
